Keys.Name: AllowFootstepSounds
Keys.Description: If Player Footsteps Should Make A Sound || Default = True

Keys.Name: FootstepVolumeMulti
Keys.Description: The Volume Level Multiplier For Footstep Sounds

Keys.Name: FootstepFrequency
Keys.Description: How Frequent Footstep Sounds Should Be, Lower = More Often, Higher = Less Often

Sections.Name: ArmorSwaySettings
Sections.Description: Related To Armor Sway Sound Settings

Keys.Name: AllowArmorSwaySounds
Keys.Description: If Armor Specific Sounds Play When The Player Moves About || Default = True

Keys.Name: ArmorSwayVolumeMulti
Keys.Description: The Volume Level Multiplier For Armor Sway Sounds

Keys.Name: ArmorSwayFrequency
Keys.Description: How Frequent Armor Sway Sounds Should Be, Lower = More Often, Higher = Less Often

Sections.Name: CompatibilityWarningSettings
Sections.Description: Related To Automatic Mod Compatibility Warning Messages

Keys.Name: AllowModCompatWarnings
Keys.Description: If Mod Should Give Warning Messages About Detected Incompatibility Issues || Default = True
